metadata.name: S1 : Episode 1 : The Big Bad Ferris Wheel
metadata.description:
Yucky Pukey and Dizzily Dizzy visit an amusement to face their worst fears. Though scared, together, they muster up the courage to ride The Big Bad Ferris Wheel.

Characters :
Yucky Pukey
Dizzily Dizzy 


Great Emotions by NBG is an animated series about a noisy bunch of friends, each representing an emotion of a child. They are loud, funny and extremely adorable.
